players.name: Bob
memory: You investigated Diana and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Charlie: "I find it strange that Alice was the one found dead last night. Let's keep a close eye on each other and make sure we vote wisely."

Charlie: "I believe it's important that we all work together to figure out who among us is the mafioso. Given the unexpected turn of events last night, I suggest we keep an open mind and carefully consider each other's actions and statements."
Diana: "Let's not jump to conclusions. We don't know who the mafioso is yet, so let's keep an open mind and discuss our options carefully."
